welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Del Aire, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay here and take some time to explore all that this wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves domestic flights and offers amenities such as a gift shop, snack bar, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Torrance Airport caters to private and charter flights, with exclusive lounges and concierge services available for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves domestic flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport provides services for private and charter flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Santa Monica Airport is primarily used for flight training and smaller aircraft.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights at Whiteman Airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal is primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport is primarily used for general aviation and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport is exclusively for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Van Nuys Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at El Monte Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport houses all major airlines and provides a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more personalized and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
